Package selfSolvingCube

Class RubiksCubeLogic

java.lang.Object
selfSolvingCube.RubiksCubeLogic
public class RubiksCubeLogic extends Object
The RubiksCubeLogic class represents the core logic for solving a Rubik's Cube using the Old Pochmann method. It is responsible for the cube state, movements, shuffling, and solving algorithms. It also handles edge and corner buffer logic, solving one piece at a time, and breaking plugging if needed. This is the most important class in the project and provides the essential functionality for solving a Rubik's Cube.

    • RubiksCubeLogic

      public RubiksCubeLogic(processing.core.PApplet sketch, Settings setting, LogWriter logWriter)
      Constructs a new RubiksCubeLogic object with the specified sketch, settings, and log writer.
      Parameters:
      sketch - the PApplet instance for drawing the cube
      setting - the settings for the Rubik's Cube
      logWriter - the log writer for logging moves and events

  • Method Details

    • shuffleCube

      public void shuffleCube()
      Shuffles the cube randomly with a number of moves between 10 and 20.

    • solve

      public void solve()
      Solves the cube using the Old Pochmann method. This method manages the process of solving both edges and corners one piece at a time. It also handles parity and breaking plugging if needed.

    • breakPlugging

      public boolean breakPlugging(Cubie cubie)
      Breaks the plugging by executing an algorithm on a given Cubie.
      Parameters:
      cubie - the Cubie to break plugging on
      Returns:
      true if the plugging was broken successfully, false otherwise

    • SolveOnePiece

      public void SolveOnePiece(int id)
      Solves one piece of the cube by executing an algorithm for the given piece ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the piece to solve

    • moveToTarget

      public OldPochmanAlgorithm moveToTarget(int id)
      Moves to the target position for the given piece ID using the Old Pochmann algorithm.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the piece to move to the target position
      Returns:
      the Old Pochmann algorithm for the given piece ID

    • lookForEdgeBuffer

      public int lookForEdgeBuffer()
      Searches for the edge buffer piece ID in the cube's current state.
      Returns:
      the edge buffer piece ID, or 1 if not found

    • lookForCornerBuffer

      public int lookForCornerBuffer()
      Searches for the corner buffer piece ID in the cube's current state.
      Returns:
      the corner buffer piece ID, or 1 if not found

    • isSolving

      public boolean isSolving()
      Returns whether the cube is being solved or not.
      Returns:
      true if the cube is being solved, false otherwise

      Sets the solving state of the cube.
      Parameters:
